name: The Great Fusion
description: Finally comes to Steam the funniest graphic adventure game from Android and iOS. Featured by Google twice, with more than 100,000 downloads and thousands of positive reviews, The Great Fusion is back remastered with full HD graphics and redesigned comics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
